content: in this legal case a petitioner submitted an application to the harju county court to reconsider a notarys decision regarding an inheritance certificate the petitioner believed that the notary made a mistake and wanted to prove their ownership of a property the notary objected to the application stating that it was unfounded the court reviewed the application and concluded that the petitioners claim was unfounded the court explained the legal provisions regarding joint assets and inheritance and rejected the petitioners application the court also mentioned that the petitioner should bear the costs of the proceedings the court has given the parties deadlines to submit lists of procedural costs and the court will determine the costs of the proceedings based on the provided procedure
